vocabInfos.mediumDef:
§ Madon = "strife"
one of the principal cities of Canaan who joined Jabin and his confederates in their battle against Joshua at the waters of Merom and were defeated
vocabInfos._es_Definition: (1)   contienda, rivalidad; (2)   alta estatura; (3)   lugar; Canaán
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
瑪頓 这个專有名詞 地名在原文的意思是 "爭吵"
迦南的主要城巿之一,聯合耶賓王及其他同盟者對抗約書亞
在米倫水邊的戰役被打敗
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
玛顿 这个专有名词 地名在原文的意思是 "争吵"
迦南的主要城巿之一,联合耶宾王及其他同盟者对抗约书亚
在米伦水边的战役被打败
